item.description: Since the dim sum meetup is so popular, I thought I'd post another food-related event. The food court at the Brighton location of Super 88 is a great place to try all different kinds of Asian foods - there are stalls for Korean, Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai, Indian, and frozen yogurt. Let's have an early lunch followed by a playdate at nearby Lawton Playground.
item.name: Lunch for Mommies & Playdate for Kiddies
